table.name: vtiger_sp_sales_funnel
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_sp_sales_funnel` ( `id` INT(19) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `description` varchar(255) DEFAULT '', `owner` INT(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_sp_sales_funnel_stages
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_sp_sales_funnel_stages`( `record_id` INT(19) NOT NULL, `report_id` INT(19) NOT NULL, `plot_field` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'count', `sequence` INT(10) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
